/Restaurants_page strings/ The Oxford Kitchen Cherwell Boathouse No.1 Ship Street
/oxford_kitchen_page strings/ Address: 215 Banbury Road, Oxford OX2 7HQ England Hours: Tue - Sat 12:00 - 14:30 and 18:00 - 23:00 website: http://www.theoxfordkitchen.co.uk Michelin-starred, nostalgic British dishes with a modern twist. Inspired creations of Executive Chef Paul Welburn, whose food has the critics talking. Paul is renowned for adding a modern twist to some of Britain’s favourite dishes. The Oxford Kitchen offers you a contemporary, intimate setting and friendly, attentive service ideal for savouring the exquisite flavour combinations of their a la carte and tasting menus. Choose from their carefully compiled wine list or start your meal with one of their signature cocktails made with fresh, local ingredients. Oxford Kitchen Oxford Kitchen
/cherwell_boathouse_page strings/ Address: 50 Bardwell Road, Oxford, England, OX2 6ST, United Kingdom Hours: 12.30-3pm 6.30-9.30pm. website: http://cherwellboathouse.co.uk/ A restaurant combined with a punt station, the Cherwell Boathouse boasts one of the best views in the city. This allows you to look out over the river with a glass from their extensive wine list, which has won ‘Wine List of the Year’ from the Good Food Guide. Owned by the Verdin family since 1968, when the restaurant was first opened, the menu matches British ingredients with Gallic flair. Delicious, unusual dishes on the menu include an artichoke crème caramel, fillet of beef with foie gras and a white chocolate and cardamom mousse. A perfect end to a day spent enjoying Oxford’s many treasures is to indulge in a meal in this ideal spot overlooking the historic pastime of punting. Cherwell boathouse Cherwell boathouse Cherwell boathouse
/no1_shipstreet_page strings/ Address: 50 Bardwell Road, Oxford, England, OX2 6ST, United Kingdom Hours: Sun: 12:00 - 15:30 Mon - Sat: 12:00 - 23:00 website: https://www.no1shipstreet.com/ The Ground Floor is a Modern British Brasserie. The First Floor is a Champagne, Oyster and Cocktail Bar. Bar dining, full A La Carte Menu available. Daily specials board with oysters, lobster and market fish of the day. No1 ShipStreet No1 ShipStreet
/Strings for Ashmolean page/ Ashmolean Museum Address: Beaumont Street, Oxford OX1 2PH. Hours Tue – Sun 10:00 – 17:00 Website: http://www.ashmolean.org The Ashmolean Museum of Art and Archaeology on Beaumont Street, Oxford, England, is the worlds first university museum. Its first building was erected in 1678–83 to house the cabinet of curiosities that \'Elias Ashmole\' gave to the University of Oxford in 1677. Sign up to tour Review this place
/Strings for events page/ Beacon Festival Oxford Literary Festival We Will Rock You Milton Impossible Oxford Boxing Championships Sign Up Sign Up Sign Up Sign Up Sign Up
/Strings for Christ Church page/ Christ Church With its compelling combination of majestic architecture, literary heritage and double identity as (parts of) Harry Potter’s Hogwarts, Christ Church attracts tourists galore. Among Oxford’s largest colleges – the largest, if you include its bucolic meadow – and proud possessor of its most impressive quad, plus a superb art gallery and even a cathedral, it was founded in 1525 by Cardinal Wolsey. It later became home to Lewis Carroll, whose picnic excursions with the then-dean’s daughter gave us Alice Adventures in Wonderland. Details Contact Number -01865-276492 Hours - 10am-5pm Mon-Sat, from 2pm Sun, last admission 4.15pm Price - adult/child Jul-Aug £10/9, Sep-Jun £8/7 www.chch.ox.ac.uk/ Review Sign Up Map

/String for Login page Login FAQPage
1. How do I leave a review?\n\n
On the main page, click on the navigation bar on the left and then visit a location or restaurant from the locations menu to leave a review.\n\n
2. How do I create an account?\n\n
From the main page, click on the navigation bar and then select Login/Signup. From the bottom of this page there is an option for Signup. Once clicked it will take you to the signup page where the details will need to be filled out and then if you are creating a tourguide account the checkbox will need to be clicked. Once done you will be able to sign in with your Email address and password.\n\n
3. Can I message other users who use the app?\n\n
Currently this feature is not implemented within the app. In the future we are looking to add this feature.
